title: Happy Birthday, Ai-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Happy Birthday, Ai-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thank you, Shizuku! So, what’s this about? This blindfold thing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, this is a special surprise only for you, Ai-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>A surprise, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>We’ve all thought of various ways to surprise you, Ai-san. Starting now, I’m going to pull your hand and guide you towards the location of the party, okay. There will be many adventures waiting for you along the way.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That sounds like a lot of fun! Let’s go, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Watch out! Ai-san! There’s a crocodile waiting for us with its mouth open!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeeh!? No, wait, there can’t be anything like that in school, right? Geez, your acting is way too realistic sometimes, Shizuku.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kyaaah! Ai-san, a black panther is going to pounce at you silently from your back!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uooooh!? Wait, that can’t be right! Hey, Shizuku! If this continues all the way to the party’s location, it’ll be too much stimulation, even for me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
